title: Spring Semester Goals
text:
Spring 2026 goals





Methods





Microscopy
Culturing
Sequencing: WGS, NGS, etc. are important skill that I want to grow at least by the end of my time in this lab ### Computational Work
Finish BLAST (Transposase Project)
Start HMMER (Transposase Project)
Maybe start machine learning classifier model (Transposase Project)
Cell imaging
Introduction to AI models like alphafold, ESM-fold, etc. (how they work)





Set up digital notebook
Read about the relationship between DNA viruses and transposase domestication

title: Lab Notebook
text:
Welcome to my open lab notebook!
This is a cataloged and searchable collection of research notes and findings.

title: Lab Notebook
text:
How to Explore This Notebook

Search: Use the search box to find entries by keywords
Filter by Category: Click on categories to filter entries by project or topic
Sort: Sort entries by date, title, or other criteria
Browse: Scroll through all entries in chronological order
